## ModelApiBooter.getApiBuilderForPattern() method

Retrieve the API builder that matches the pattern provided

**Signature:**


|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  pattern | string | name of pattern for an API builder |
